boat.construction_details: Carvel larch/p pine on oak sawn frame
boat.full_description: Last professional rebuild completed 2005 with new deck, new mast, new 3 cylinder Beta 28hp diesel engine (now used only about 220 hours) new sterngear, gas cooker with oven and two burners, heads, sink etc. Many custom made stainless steel fittings. Furono GPS, NASA wind instrument, echo sounder, steering compass, VHF radio. Equipped for cruising, with four berths, standing headroom in saloon, Wickham Martin furling gear for jib, extra reefing point in mainsail.
boat.name: Rose
